spells.name: Fire Bolt
spells.description: Description: A small fiery projectile launches from your hand towards a target.
spells.effect:
Effect:
Rank 1 - Has a 10% chance to burn for 2d4 magic fire damage for 1d4 rounds.
Rank 4 - Has a 20% chance to burn for 2d4 magic fire damage for 1d4 rounds.
Rank 6 - Has a 30% chance to burn for 2d4 magic fire damage for 1d4 rounds.

spells.name: Fire Shield
spells.description: Description: Coat yourself in a thin barrier made of magical fire that has a chance to deal damage when struck by a melee attack.
spells.effect:
Effect: Has a 50% chance to deal damage when struck by a melee attack and a 50% chance to burn the target for 2d4 magic fire damage for 1d4 rounds.
You may only have one active magic shield spell at a time.

spells.name: Fire Wall
spells.description: Description: You summon a wall of intense, roaring fire at a target location. Rank 1 Fire Wall is a 5-foot cube.
spells.effect:
Effect: Wall increases in width and height by 5 feet for each rank beyond 1. The wall's thickness will always be 5 feet.
Endurance DC to withstand the flames and pass through: 6 + 2/additional rank.
Targets within 5 feet of the wall or those attempting to pass through the wall suffer an immediate 2d6 + 1d6/additional rank magic fire damage.
You may have a maximum of 2 walls active at a time. Walls must be summoned upon existing terrain of an equal or greater surface area.

spells.name: Imbue Fire
spells.description: Description: Imbue your own weapon or an ally's weapon (natural weapons like claws are eligible), within cast range with a fiery blaze that lasts for 3 rounds.
spells.effect:
Effect: Provides light in a 30 foot radius around the imbued weapon.
Rank 1 - Adds 1d4 magic fire damage.
Rank 2 - Adds 1d6 magic fire damage.
Rank 3 - Adds 1d8 magic fire damage.
Rank 4 - Adds 1d10 magic fire damage.
Rank 5 - Adds 1d12 magic fire damage.

spells.name: Fire Aura
spells.description: Description: Surround yourself in an aura of flickering flames that burns everything within your vicinity.
spells.effect:
Effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target for 2d6 magic fire damage for 1d4 rounds.
(Targets that take damage from Aura spells gain no benefit from Reflex saves for reduced damage)

spells.name: Fire Blast
spells.description: Description: You hurl a handful of fire at a target, causing a small explosion upon contact that damages nearby creatures and objects.
spells.effect:
Effect: Explodes in a 10 foot radius. Has a 30% chance to burn the target for 2d4 magic fire damage for 1d4 rounds.
All creatures hit by the splash must make a Reflex save (DC: 14), targets that succeed save for half damage, those that fail take full damage.

spells.name: Fire Ball
spells.description: Description: You lob a hot ball of fire at a target, causing an explosion upon contact that damages nearby creatures and objects.
spells.effect:
Effect: Explodes in a 20 foot radius. Has a 50% chance to burn the target for 2d8 magic fire damage for 1d4 rounds.
All creatures hit by the splash must make a Reflex save (DC: 14), targets that succeed save for half damage, those that fail take full damage.

spells.name: Fire Storm
spells.description: Description: A sudden and persistent updraft of searing winds and flames covers a 30 foot cubical area within your range. You may reposition the fire storm once per round up to 30 feet as a standard action. This deals damage to targets inside of the Fire Storm instantly upon casting and if a target starts their turn in the Fire Storm.
spells.effect:
Effect: Has a 20% chance to burn the target for 2d10 magic fire damage for 1d4 rounds.
All creatures inside the spell must make a Reflex save (DC: 14), targets that succeed save for half damage, those that fail take full damage.

spells.name: Incendiary Cloud
spells.description: Description: Summon a dangerous fiery mist at a target location, engulfing all creatures inside.
spells.effect:
Effect: Has a 20% chance to burn the target for 2d8 magic fire damage for 1d4 rounds.
All creatures inside the spell must make a Reflex save (DC: 14), targets that succeed save for half damage, those that fail take full damage.

spells.name: Orb of Fire
spells.description: Description: You summon a large orb of fire energy that travels in a straight line outward from you at a rate of 20 feet per round, dissipating after 3 rounds or until dispelled. This attack will hit up to 5 targets within 10 feet of the orb, prioritizing those closest to the orb. After striking 5 times, the orb will dissipate (this can happen if 5 attacks are made before 3 rounds are up).
spells.effect: Effect: Has a 20% chance to burn the target for 1d12 magic fire damage for 1d4 rounds. The attacks from Orb of Fire can be countered.

spells.name: Flaming Meteor Strike
spells.description: Description: Summon a flaming meteor from the sky above to bring mass destruction to those around you.
spells.damage: Damage: 2d20 + 1d20/additional rank magic crushing damage & 2d20 + 1d20/additional rank magic fire damage.
spells.effect:
Effect: Deals damage to all targets in a 50 foot radius. Has a 20% chance to burn the target for 1d12 magic fire damage for 1d4 rounds.
All creatures inside the spell must make a Reflex save (DC: 14), targets that succeed save for half damage, those that fail take full damage.
spells.atHigherLevel:
Focus DC: 20 + 1/additional rank
Each rank of this spell requires the equivalent rank of Meteor Strike to be learned first.

spells.effect: Effect: Has a 50% chance to spread to a nearby target and a 20% chance to spread to a second target (this effect does not chain).

spells.name: Ice Bolt

spells.effect:
Effect:
Rank 1 - Has a 10% chance to chill the target for 1d4 rounds.
Rank 4 - Has a 20% chance to chill the target for 1d4 rounds.
Rank 6 - Has a 30% chance to chill the target for 1d4 rounds.
*Chilled targets suffer -1 to all rolls for the duration.

spells.effect:
Effect: Grants a 10 EP magic barrier. Has a 50% chance to deal damage when struck by a melee attack. Ice Shield does not dissipate if the EP from the barrier is reduced to zero. Ice shield stacks with other barriers.
You may only have one active magic shield spell at a time.

spells.name: Ice Wall
spells.description: Description: You summon a wall of thick ice at a target location that blocks the way. Rank 1 Ice Wall is a 5-foot cube.
spells.effect:
Effect: Wall increases in width and height by 5 feet for each rank beyond 1. The wall's thickness will always be 5 feet.
Creatures within 5 feet of the wall or creatures that attack the wall have a 50% chance to become chilled for 2 rounds.
Ice Wall EP: 25 + 15/additional rank.
Targets that have Ice Wall summoned under their feet must make an Agility save (DC: 12) or be forcefully ejected backwards 10 feet, suffering 2d10 crushing damage. Targets who succeed on their Agility save may choose to step back or ride the wall to its max height.
You may have a maximum of 2 walls active at a time. Walls must be summoned upon existing terrain of an equal or greater surface area.
*Chilled targets suffer -1 to all rolls for the duration.

Effect: Your Mirror Images have 1/4 of your max HP and your base Focus and Initiative scores. They have an NEP and MR of 15. All of the Mirror Images' other stats are effectively zero.
They only cast Rank 6 Magic Missile and get 1 attack action and move action on your turn. The Mirror Images can move 30 feet per round and you can see through their eyes. They are not able to move through solid objects.
Targets suffer -4 to checks to determine if they're attacking a Mirror Image or the caster.
Mirror Images can be used once per day.

spells.name: Spellsteal
spells.description: Description: Attempt to steal a target's beneficial spell effect for yourself for the rest of its duration.
spells.effect:
Effect: Each time you use Spellsteal successfully, its cost is increased by 2x. This cost increase lasts until you complete a long rest.
*Certain spell effects cannot be stolen.

spells.name: Telekinesis
spells.description: Description: You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought.
spells.effect:
Effect: When you cast the spell, and as your action each round for the duration, you can exert your will on one creature or object that you can see within range, causing the appropriate effect below. You can affect the same target round after round, or choose a new one at any time. If you switch targets, the prior target is no longer affected by the spell.
On subsequent rounds, you can use your action to attempt to maintain your telekinetic grip on the creature by repeating the contest.
If the object is worn or carried by a creature, you must make an opposed check with your Focus check contested by that creatures Strength check. If you succeed, you pull the object away from that creature and can move it up to 30 feet in any direction but not beyond the range of this spell.
You can exert fine control on objects with your telekinetic grip, such as manipulating a simple tool, opening a door or a container, stowing or retrieving an item from an open container, or pouring the contents from a vial.

spells.name: Wall of Force
spells.description: Description: Create a 5 foot cube of nullifying energy that stops anything from passing through it, whether it is physical or magical (can be phased through).
spells.effect:
Effect: This ability blocks all movement through it and it is transparent. Objects/enemies can phase through a Wall of Force. You may have multiple Walls of Force active but you must pay upkeep every round or they dissipate.
Targets that have Wall of Force summoned at their location must make an Agility save (DC: 12) or be forcefully ejected backwards 10 feet, suffering 2d10 crushing damage.

spells.name: Vacuum Space
spells.description: Description: You magically remove the air in a 5 foot cubical area.
spells.effect: <u class='sx-description'>Effect:</u> This dispels all forms of fire except shadow fire, black fire and white fire. Targets caught in Vacuum Space that need to breathe begin to suffocate as the air is removed from their lungs. Vacuum Space increases in size by 5 cubic feet for each rank beyond 1.

spells.name: Magical Combat IV
spells.description: Description: You charge magical energy over time and release a devastating burst at a target. Charging a burst takes 1 action. You may release the charges as part of your final charge action.
spells.effect: <u class='sx-description'>Effect:</u> You may charge 3 times per action and each charge costs 8MP. You may charge until you are out of MP.
spells.atHigherLevel:
Focus DC: 16 + 1 per 3 charges
Costs +3,000 additional XP to purchase.

spells.name: Anti-Incorporeal Field
spells.description: Description: You surround yourself with a zone that expels all ethereal beings and prevents them from entering the zone. You must continue to channel this spell for it to remain active. Taking any other actions will dissolve the anti-incorporeal field. You must pass the Focus DC at the start of each one of your turns for the anti-magic field to remain active.
spells.effect:
Effect: Expels all ethereal beings and prevents them from entering the zone.
*Special exceptions apply

spells.name: Barkskin
spells.description: Description: Protect yourself or another target in a protective membrane that negates the outcome of a dangerous attack.
spells.effect: <u class='sx-description'>Effect:</u> Nullify the next critical effect against the target with Barkskin. The target still takes the damage of the critical attack like normal. Barkskin can be used once per day.

spells.name: Levitate V
spells.description: Description: You magically propel yourself so that you may hover above ground.
spells.effect: <u class='sx-description'>Effect:</u> Allows you to hover a foot above the ground at your base walking speed. At double the cost you may now fly at base walking speed. While in combat, you must succeed on your Focus DC at the start of each of your turns to remain levitating.
spells.atHigherLevel:
Focus DC: 22
Costs +7,000 additional XP to purchase.
Requires 15 Ranks of Focus

spells.name: Magical Combat V
spells.description: Description: You charge magical energy over time and release a devastating burst at a target. Charging a burst takes 1 action. You may release the charges as part of your final charge action.
spells.effect: <u class='sx-description'>Effect:</u> You may charge 3 times per action and each charge costs 10MP. You may charge until you are out of MP.
spells.atHigherLevel:
Focus DC: 18 + 1 per 3 charges
Costs +4,000 additional XP to purchase.

spells.name: Mana Shield
spells.description: Description: You surround yourself in a barrier that is a physical embodiment of your own MP.
spells.effect: <u class='sx-description'>Effect:</u> While active you only take damage to your MP, until your MP runs out or Mana Shield is canceled by the caster. You must make a Focus save (DC: 20) at the start of each of your turns to maintain the shield.
spells.atHigherLevel:
Focus DC: 20
*This ability requires 100MP before you can learn it.

spells.name: Starfall
spells.description: Description: Surround yourself in an aura of magic that strikes nearby foes with magical stars.
spells.effect: Effect: (Targets that take damage from Aura spells gain no benefit from Reflex saves for reduced damage)

spells.name: Astral Projection
spells.description: Description: You summon a magical copy of yourself.
spells.effect:
Effect: Your Astral Projection has 1/2 of your max HP and your base Focus and Initiative scores. It has an NEP and MR of 25. All of the Astral Projection's other stats are effectively zero.
It can cast spells you know at 2x the spell cost and gets 1 attack action and move action on your turn. The Astral Projection can move 30 feet per round and you can see through its eyes. It is not able to move through solid objects.
spells.atHigherLevel:
Focus DC: 24
Costs +3,000 additional XP to purchase.

spells.name: Levitate VI
spells.description: Description: You may now magically hover or fly passively as long as your MP is not depleted
spells.effect: <u class='sx-description'>Effect:</u> Allows you to hover a foot above the ground at your base walking speed. You may now fly at 2x your base walking speed.
spells.atHigherLevel:
Can activate at-will
Costs +50,000 additional XP to purchase.
Requires 18 Ranks of Focus

spells.name: Mage Armor
spells.description: Description: You cover yourself in a shimmery layer of magical armor that reduces damage you receive and makes spells easier to cast. Targets may have a maximum of one Mage Armor protecting them at a time.
spells.effect: <u class='sx-description'>Effect:</u> Grants +5 NEP and +5 MR. Reduces Focus DC of all other spells by -2. Reduces MP cost of all other spells by -2 (to a minimum cost of 2MP). Mage Armor can be used three times per day.

spells.name: Magical Combat VI
spells.description: Description: You charge magical energy over time and release a devastating burst at a target. Charging a burst takes 1 action. You may release the charges as part of your final charge action.
spells.effect: <u class='sx-description'>Effect:</u> You may charge 3 times per action and each charge costs 12MP. You may charge until you are out of MP.
spells.atHigherLevel:
Focus DC: 20 + 1 per 3 charges
Costs +5,000 additional XP to purchase.

spells.name: Mental Mine
spells.description: Description: You implant a mental boobytrap inside of your mind. Anyone attempting to dominate your mind through the use of magic triggers the mine.
spells.effect:
Effect: Triggering the mental mine negates the mental manipulation, deals damage to the attacker and staggers the attacker with a 50% chance to stun for 1 round (Endurance DC: 20).
Mental Mine can be used once per day.
spells.atHigherLevel:
Focus DC: 24
Costs +5,000 additional XP to purchase.

spells.name: Teleport
spells.description: Description: You teleport yourself and up to two allies you're touching a short distance away from danger.
spells.effect: <u class='sx-description'>Effect:</u> Teleport 1/2 of your base move speed + 5 feet/rank. Can be used as a counter action. Must have line of sight of your Teleport destination. Does not provoke opportunity attacks.
spells.atHigherLevel:
Maximum of 6 ranks. Focus DC: 20 + 1/additional rank
Each additional rank costs +1,000 more XP than the previous rank

spells.name: Dimension Door
spells.description: Description: You carve a medium-sized door out of thin air that is used to traverse great distances that you have previously visited.
spells.cost: Cost: 50 MP and reduce Max MP by 15% + 2% Max MP/additional rank
spells.effect:
Effect: Travel distance = 1,000 feet * spell rank
Dimension Door can be used by as many travelers as you have ranks in this spell, up to a max of 6 in one use.
Can be used once per day.
spells.atHigherLevel:
Maximum of 6 ranks. Focus DC: 22 + 2/additional rank
Each additional rank costs +5,000 more XP than the previous rank
Requires 15 Ranks of Focus

spells.name: Portal
spells.description:
Description: You conjure a portal linking an unoccupied space you can see within range to a precise location on a different part of the current planet you're on. The portal is a circular opening, which you can make 5 feet to 20 feet in diameter. You can orient the portal in any direction you choose. The portal lasts for the duration.
The portal has a front and a back at each location where it appears. Travel through the portal is possible only by moving through its front. Anything that does so is instantly transported to the other location, appearing in the unoccupied space nearest to the portal.
spells.cost: Cost: 100 MP and reduce Max MP by 50%
spells.effect:
Effect: Travel distance = anywhere on the same planet
Portal can transport up to 20 creatures before closing.
Can be used once per day.
spells.atHigherLevel:
Focus DC: 35
Requires Dimension Door Rank 6 and a Portal Trainer/Manual to learn this ability.
Costs +25,000 additional XP to purchase.
Requires 20 Ranks of Focus

spells.name: Rainbow Meteor Strike
spells.description: Description: Summon a meteor enchanted with all base elements from the sky above to bring ultimate destruction to those around you.
spells.effect:
Effect: Deals damage to all targets in a 50 foot radius
Deals 2d20 + 1d20/additional rank magic crushing damage
Deals 2d20 + 1d20/additional rank magic piercing damage
Deals 2d20 + 1d20/additional rank magic slashing damage with a 30% chance to cause 3 points of blood loss.
Deals 2d20 + 1d20/additional rank magic ice damage with a 30% chance to chill the target for 1d4 rounds.
Deals 2d20 + 1d20/additional rank magic fire damage with a 20% chance to burn the target for 1d12 magic fire for 1d4 rounds.
Deals 2d20 + 1d20/additional rank magic lightning damage with a 20% chance to stagger the target and a 20% chance to damage their electronics. Targets who are already staggered have a 10% chance at being stunned (Endurance DC: 17).
All creatures inside the spell must make a Reflex save (DC: 14), targets that succeed save for half damage, those that fail take full damage.
*Chilled targets suffer -1 to all rolls for the duration.
*Staggered targets must succeed on an Endurance Save (DC: 15) or have one less action on their next turn. Electronic damage can affect up to 2 devices from one attack (affects electronics that are equipped or in a non-magic container).
*This blood loss is immediate and is not able to be resisted without a blood loss resistance/immunity. Target must suffer HP damage from the attack for the blood loss to apply.
spells.atHigherLevel:
Focus DC: 30 + 1/additional rank
Requires Rank 6 of all other Meteor Strikes to learn this ability.
Costs +25,000 additional XP to purchase.

spells.name: Arcane Explosion
spells.description: Description: You expel an arcane explosion outward striking all targets within 20 feet.
spells.damage: Damage: 2d10 + 1d10/additional rank arcane damage. +1d10 per arcane charge
spells.effect:
Effect: Each successful cast generates an Arcane Charge. You may hold a max of 5 arcane charges and the charges last for 5 rounds. You must declare the number of arcane charges you are using before casting to receive the bonus damage.
All creatures affected by the spell must make a Reflex save (DC: 14), targets that succeed save for half damage, those that fail take full damage.

spells.name: Bo Staff of Fluid Strikes
spells.description: Description: You summon a bo staff made of solid water (not ice!) that you can use to beat your foes senseless.
spells.effect:
Effect: The staff has a 20 Crit (19 at rank 6) and an 11 + 1/additional rank Miss.
For ranks 1-5 the staff has a 5 foot reach. At rank 6 this increases to 10 feet.

spells.name: Imbue Water
spells.description: Description: Imbue your own weapon or an ally's weapon (natural weapons like claws are eligible), within cast range with a watery flow that lasts for 3 rounds.
spells.effect:
Effect:
Rank 1 - Adds 1d4 magic piercing damage.
Rank 2 - Adds 1d6 magic piercing damage.
Rank 3 - Adds 1d8 magic piercing damage.
Rank 4 - Adds 1d10 magic piercing damage.
Rank 5 - Adds 1d12 magic piercing damage.

spells.name: Water Bolt
spells.description: Description: A small bolt of water launches from your hand towards a target.

spells.name: Water Shield
spells.description: Description: Coat yourself in a thin barrier made of magical water that has a chance to deal damage when struck by a melee attack and grants increased Reflex.
spells.effect:
Effect: Has a 50% chance to deal damage when struck by a melee attack and grants +2 Reflex for the duration.
You may only have one active magic shield spell at a time.

spells.name: Water Wall
spells.description: Description: You summon a wall of gushing, swirling water at a target location that reduces projectile speed and helps obscure you from your foes. Rank 1 Water Wall is a 5-foot cube.
spells.effect:
Effect: Wall increases in width and height by 5 feet for each rank beyond 1. The wall's thickness will always be 5 feet.
Strength DC to pass through the wall: 12 + 2/additional rank.
30% chance to deflect non-ballistic projectiles.
10% chance to deflect ballistic projectiles.
Targets suffer a -3 to Spot, Examine and Search checks due to poor visibility when looking through the wall of water. You may have a maximum of 2 walls active at a time. Walls must be summoned upon existing terrain of an equal or greater surface area.

spells.name: Water Aura
spells.description: Description: Surround yourself in an aura of rippling water that increases reflexive capabilities.
spells.effect:
Effect: All creatures within the aura receive +2 Reflex.
(Targets that take damage from Aura spells gain no benefit from Reflex saves for reduced damage)

spells.name: Water Blast
spells.description: Description: You hurl a ball of magic water towards a target.
spells.effect:
Effect: Explodes in a 10 foot radius.
All creatures hit by the splash must make a Reflex save (DC: 14), targets that succeed save for half damage, those that fail take full damage.

spells.name: Heart of Water
spells.description: Description: You coat yourself or an ally in a thin layer of magical water that reduces damage you receive and makes it more difficult for attackers to hit you. Targets may have a maximum of one Heart of Water protecting them at a time.
spells.effect: <u class='sx-description'>Effect:</u> Grants 2 + 1/additional rank NEP and MR. Attackers suffer a -2 penalty to all attack rolls against creatures with Heart of Water.

spells.name: Water Geyser
spells.description: Description: A geyser of magical water bursts forth from your hands striking all targets in a frontal cone.
spells.effect: Effect: All creatures affected by the spell must make a Reflex save (DC: 14), targets that succeed save for half damage, those that fail take full damage.

spells.name: Obscuring Mist
spells.description: Description: Surround yourself in a thick mist made of magical water that obscures you from your foes.
spells.effect: Effect: Grants +3 Stealth and enemies suffer -2 to attacks against you for the duration.

spells.name: Typhoon
spells.description: Description: A surging wall of water flows forth from you. The Typhoon travels 20 feet per round for 3 rounds unless it collides with a huge object or creature first.
spells.effect: Effect: Each target struck by Typhoon must make a Strength save (DC: 13) or be pushed with the Typhoon. Targets being pushed by the Typhoon take full damage at the start of their turn if they fail their Strength save. Targets that collide with another creature or object while being pushed by Typhoon also take 2d10 crushing damage.

spells.name: Water Spout
spells.description: Description: A torrential water twister suddenly appears and covers a 30 foot square area within your range. You may reposition the Water Spout once per round up to 30 feet as a standard action. This deals damage to targets inside the radius of the Water Spout instantly upon casting and if a target starts their turn in/near the Water Spout.
spells.effect:
Effect: Creatures within the radius of the Water Spout must succeed on a Strength save (DC: 12 + 1/Water Spout Rank) or be sucked into the eye of the Water Spout. Creatures starting their turn inside the eye of the Water Spout take an extra hit die worth of damage and must succeed on a Strength save (DC: 12 + 1/Water Spout Rank) or have a 50% chance at being ejected violently from the eye of the Water Spout.
All creatures affected by the spell must make a Reflex save (DC: 14), targets that succeed save for half damage, those that fail take full damage.

spells.name: Torrent
spells.description: Description: You summon a large orb of water energy that travels in a straight line outward from you at a rate of 20 feet per round, dissipating after 3 rounds or until dispelled. This attack will hit up to 5 targets within 10 feet of the orb, prioritizing those closest to the orb. After striking 5 times, the orb will dissipate (this can happen if 5 attacks are made before 3 rounds are up).
spells.effect: Effect: The attacks from Torrent can be countered.

spells.name: Flowing Meteor Strike
spells.description: Description: Summon a water-covered meteor from the sky above to bring mass destruction to those around you.
spells.damage: Damage: 2d20 + 1d20/additional rank magic crushing damage & 2d20 + 1d20/additional rank magic piercing damage.
spells.effect:
Effect: Deals damage to all targets in a 50 foot radius.
All creatures inside the spell must make a Reflex save (DC: 14), targets that succeed save for half damage, those that fail take full damage.
spells.atHigherLevel:
Focus DC: 20 + 1/additional rank
Each rank of this spell requires the equivalent rank of Meteor Strike to be learned first.

spells.name: Hydro Pump
spells.description: Description: You barrage a target with an intense stream of hydro magic.
spells.effect:
Effect: Targets affected by Hydro Pump are classified as being barraged and suffer -4 to all checks. Being barraged reduces movement speed by 1/2. Targets attempting to move while being barraged can be counterattacked more than once by the caster.
Caster must make a Focus check for each action that they maintain Hydro Pump (including counter attacks).

spells.name: Bless Weapon
spells.description: Description: Imbue your own weapon or an ally's weapon (natural weapons like claws are eligible), within cast range with a holy light that lasts for 3 rounds.
spells.effect:
Effect: Provides light in a 15 foot radius around the blessed weapon.

Rank 1 - Adds 1d4 celestial damage.
Rank 2 - Adds 1d6 celestial damage.
Rank 3 - Adds 1d8 celestial damage.
Rank 4 - Adds 1d10 celestial damage.
Rank 5 - Adds 1d12 celestial damage.

spells.name: Celestial Bolt
spells.description: Description: A small bolt of holy energy launches from your hand towards a target. Can deal damage to foes or heal allies.
spells.damage:
Damage: 1d12 + 1d12/additional rank celestial damage.
Healing: 1d8 + 1d8/additional rank healing.

spells.name: Consecration Aura
spells.description: Description: Bless the area around you, damaging all enemies who dare enter your sacred ground and healing your friends instead. You're such a holy person. Jesus would be proud.
spells.damage:
Damage: 2d6 + 1d6/additional rank celestial damage.
Healing: 1d4 + 1d4/additional rank healing.
spells.effect:
Effect: Surround yourself in a holy aura, dealing damage to enemies who enter and healing allies inside.
(Targets that take damage from Aura spells gain no benefit from Reflex saves for reduced damage)

spells.name: Imbue Agility
spells.description: Description: Grant yourself or an ally within range an Agility boost.
spells.effect: Effect: Target gains 1 Agility + 1/additional rank for 1d4 rounds.

spells.name: Imbue Endurance
spells.description: Description: Grant yourself or an ally within range an Endurance boost.
spells.effect: Effect: Target gains 1 Endurance + 1/additional rank for 1d4 rounds.

spells.name: Imbue Strength
spells.description: Description: Grant yourself or an ally within range a Strength boost.
spells.effect: Effect: Target gains 1 Strength + 1/additional rank.

spells.name: Minor Heal
spells.description: Description: Fill yourself or a creature that you can see within range with a small burst of positive energy, causing it to regain hit points.
spells.effect:
Effect: Target creature regains 20 + 10/additional rank HP.
This ability does not work on evil/undead/demonic/constructs.
This ability cannot be used to inflict damage.

spells.name: Sunfire
spells.description: Description: A vertical column of angelic light engulfs a target.
spells.effect: Effect: Ignites the target and burns them for 1d12 celestial damage for 1d8 rounds.

spells.name: Celestial Barrier
spells.description: Description: Cover yourself or an ally in a blessed barrier that blocks most forms of incoming damage.
spells.effect:
Effect: Grants a 2d12 + 1d12/additional rank Celestial Magic Barrier. Lasts for 3 rounds.
Targets may only be affected by one Barrier spell at a time.
This ability has a 2 round cooldown.

spells.name: Celestial Blast
spells.description: Description: You hurl a ball of holy goodness towards a target.
spells.effect:
Effect: Explodes in a 10 foot radius.
You can overload Celestial Blast with +1d12 celestial damage for 1CP.
Your overload limit is equal to your Celestial Caster Level (ex. If your Celestial Caster Level is 4, you can overload an additional 4CP into Celestial Blast).
You must declare how much you are overloading before casting.
All creatures hit by the splash must make a Reflex save (DC: 14), targets that succeed save for half damage, those that fail take full damage.
spells.atHigherLevel: Maximum of 6 ranks. Focus DC: 13 + 1/additional rank + 1/CP overload

spells.name: Renew
spells.description: Description: Enchant yourself or a creature that you can see within range with a small health regeneration spell, causing it to regain hit points over time.
spells.effect:
Effect: Target creature regains 1d4 HP + 1d4/additional rank per round. A target can only have 1 Renew active at a time.
This ability does not work on evil/undead/demonic/constructs.

spells.name: Celestial Blade Barrier
spells.description: Description: Surrounds you in a flurry of holy blades that lash out at melee attackers.
spells.effect: Effect: 50% chance when you take damage that the attacker takes damage from this ability. Lasts for 3 rounds.

spells.name: Celestial Strike
spells.description: Description: You call down heaven's light in a target area, hopefully smiting the heathens who were unfortunate enough to be caught inside.
spells.effect:
Effect: Summon a 10 foot radius, 40 foot high cylinder at a target location.
All creatures affected by the spell must make a Reflex save (DC: 14), targets that succeed save for half damage, those that fail take full damage.

spells.name: Power Word: Shield
spells.description: Description: Call out the soul of a target to protect its physical form. The soul presents itself as a physical barrier, but then is weakened for the rest of the day.
spells.effect:
Effect: Grants an ally or yourself a 50 EP Magic Barrier but reduces their Max HP and SP by 20% for the rest of the day. Lasts for 3 rounds. After Power Word: Shield expires the target's soul becomes weakened and they cannot benefit from Power Word: Shield for the rest of the day.
Can only be used on living targets.

spells.name: Remove Curse
spells.description: Description: Fill yourself or an ally within range with a strong blessing in an attempt to drive out a lesser curse.
spells.effect:
Effect: Make an opposing Focus check with the creature that applied the curse and win, defender is the curse giver in this instance, to remove the curse.
*This only applies to lesser curses used during combat

spells.name: Celestial Storm
spells.description: Description: You create a swirling mass of celestial energy that explodes in an area around you, damaging foes and restoring you or an ally's health. For your health, dumb dumb.
spells.effect:
Effect: Explodes in a radius around the caster, damaging enemies and healing you or a nearby ally for 1/4 of the damage dealt.
All creatures affected by the spell must make a Reflex save (DC: 14), targets that succeed save for half damage, those that fail take full damage.

spells.name: Critical Heal
spells.description: Description: Fill yourself or a creature that you can see within range with a surge of positive energy, causing it to regain hit points.
spells.effect:
Effect: Target creature regains 5d12 + 1d12/additional rank HP.
This ability does not work on evil/undead/demonic/constructs.
Each time you use Critical Heal successfully, its cost is increased by 2CP and its Focus DC is increased by 1. This cost increase lasts until you complete a long rest.
This ability cannot be used to inflict damage.

spells.name: Lance of Light
spells.description: Description: A piercing beam of holy energy launches from your hand hitting targets in a line.
spells.effect: Effect: This attack pierces each target that it stikes. Lance of Light's damage decreases by 1/2 after every target it hits.

spells.name: Smite
spells.description: Description: Attack a foe with the Lord's light, granting you a barrier as well.
spells.effect:
Effect: If Smite deals HP damage, it grants you a 10 EP magic barrier.
This barrier stacks with itself and has a maximum EP of 30.
This barrier does not stack with other barriers.

spells.name: Binding Heal
spells.description: Description: Cast a moderately powerful heal and share it between you and one target of your choice.
spells.cost: Cost: Reduces Max CP by 5% + 1%/additional rank
spells.effect:
Effect: Heals for 2d10 + 1d10/additional rank HP split evenly (50/50) between you and a target of your choice within range.
This ability does not work on evil/undead/demonic/constructs.
This ability cannot be used to inflict damage.

spells.name: Power Word: Fortitude
spells.description: Description: Bolster a target's stamina, increasing their max health for 1 hour.
spells.cost: Cost: Reduce Max MP and Max CP by 10%
spells.effect: Effect: Grants a target 50 Max HP for 1 hour. Power Word: Fortitude can be used once per day.

spells.name: Holy Wrath
spells.description: Description: Holy energy strikes down all evil/undead/demonic creatures that surround you.
spells.effect:
Effect: Explodes in a radius around the caster, smiting evil enemies and healing you and your allies for 1/4 of the damage dealt (within cast range).
Creatures attacked by this spell may counter it.

spells.name: Orb of Light
spells.description: Description: You summon a large orb of celestial energy that travels in a straight line outward from you at a rate of 20 feet per round, dissipating after 3 rounds or until dispelled. This attack will hit up to 5 targets within 10 feet of the orb, prioritizing those closest to the orb. After striking 5 times, the orb will dissipate (this can happen if 5 attacks are made before 3 rounds are up).
spells.effect: Effect: The attacks from Orb of Light can be countered.

spells.name: Prayer of Mending
spells.description: Description: Bestow a powerful prayer upon a target. When that target takes damage they're healed and the prayer jumps to a nearby ally.
spells.cost: Cost: 10CP and reduces Max CP by 5%
spells.effect:
Effect: Place a prayer on an ally that heals them for 5d20 HP when they take damage and then jumps to an ally within 20 feet. If no ally is within 20 feet after the heal, it will jump as a swift action as soon as an ally is within range.
The heal from Prayer of Mending occurs after the target takes damage. Prayer of Mending will expire after 3 rounds or until it heals 5 targets. Prayer of Mending prioritizes targets with lower HP.
This ability does not work on evil/undead/demonic/constructs.

spells.name: Blades of Blood
spells.description: Description: Pierce your skin and turn your blood into magically-enhanced, razor sharp blades that you then cast at your target.
spells.effect:
Effect:
Rank 1 - Cast 1d4 Blades that deal 1d8 blood damage each.
Rank 2 - Cast 1d6 Blades that deal 1d8 blood damage each.
Rank 3 - Cast 1d8 Blades that deal 1d8 blood damage each.
Rank 4 - Cast 1d10 Blades that deal 1d8 blood damage each.
Rank 5 - Cast 1d12 Blades that deal 1d8 blood damage each.
Rank 6 - Cast 1d20 Blades that deal 1d8 blood damage each.

spells.name: Blood Armor
spells.description: Description: You coat yourself in a thin layer of living blood that reduces damage you take. Targets may have a maximum of one Blood Armor protecting them at a time.
spells.cost: Cost: 4MP + 2MP/additional rank and reduces Max HP by 5%.

spells.effect: Effect: All creatures affected by the spell must make a Reflex save (DC: 14), targets that succeed save for half damage, those that fail take full damage.

spells.cost: Cost: 5% * Rank of Max MP + 5% * Rank of Max HP
spells.effect: Effect: Reduce a target's Combat Skills by 2 + 1/additional rank for 1d4 rounds. This effect does not stack. Targets may be afflicted by 1 blood curse at a time.

spells.name: Blood Sacrifice
spells.materials: Requires Blood of the victim drawn in a pentagram and a Sacrificial knife.
spells.description: Description: Draw a pentagram in the target's blood, place their body in the center and plunge a sacrificial knife into their heart. This will sacrifice the victim, stealing their very essence.
spells.cost: Cost: Reduce Max MP and Max HP by 10%
spells.effect:
Effect: If you have a soul vessel, such as a soul stone, you capture the target's soul. This ability also heals you for 50% of the target's max HP and restores your SP equal to the amount of the target's remaining SP (if they have any). You may not sacrifice a dead/undead/construct target.
The ritual requires a sacrificial knife and takes 10 rounds to complete and if you are interrupted during the ritual, you must start over.

spells.name: Create Soulstone
spells.description: Description: Create a VVS stone out of blood and magic that can store souls.
spells.cost: Cost: Reduce Max MP and Max HP by 20%
spells.effect: Effect: Stores 5 souls + 5/additional rank.

spells.name: Aura of Weakness
spells.description: Description: Bestow a crippling malady on any unsuspecting target that enters your aura, causing it to become weaker the more actions it takes.
spells.effect: Effect: Any time a target other than you makes an action within your aura, there is a 60% chance their max HP is reduced by 5% until they complete a long rest. When a target loses max HP from this effect, also reduce your max HP by 5%. This effect does not stack (this includes Curse of Weakness).

spells.name: Corpse Explosion
spells.description: Description: You cause a nearby corpse to explode violently, dealing damage to all nearby targets.
spells.effect:
Effect: All creatures affected by the spell must make a Reflex save (DC: 14), targets that succeed save for half damage, those that fail take full damage.

spells.name: Vampiric Touch
spells.description: Description: Grasp a living biological target and drain their life force.
spells.effect:
Effect: Drain the life of the target, restoring your HP for half of the drained amount.

HP: 100 + 10% Caster Max HP
Strength & Endurance: 8
Agility: 2
Focus & Melee: 11
HP Regen: 5/round
30 Move Speed
10 NEP
10 Magic Resistance

spells.description: Description: You crush and mangle a nearby corpse into a mass of blood and bone and then smash it into a nearby target.
spells.damage: Damage: 2d10 + 1d10/additional rank blood damage & 2d10 + 1d10/additional rank crushing damage.
spells.effect:

spells.name: Desecration Aura
spells.description: Description: Desecrate the area around you, damaging all enemies who dare enter your dark aura. You're such a dark person. Jesus would not be proud.
spells.effect:

(Targets that take damage from Aura spells gain no benefit from Reflex saves for reduced damage)
The damage from this attack cannot be phased.

spells.name: Shadow Bolt
spells.description: Description: A small bolt of dark energy launches from your hand towards a target.
spells.effect:
Effect: You may overcharge Shadow Bolt up to 6 times by spending 2MP per charge, up to a maximum of 12MP. You may charge 3 times (up to 6MP) as part of an attack action and release it as a free action after. Each charge adds an extra 1d10 shadow damage.
This attack cannot be phased.

spells.name: Shadow Word: Pain
spells.description: Description: Taint a target with a creeping shadow that digs into their body causing constant pain.
spells.effect: Effect: Lasts 1d4 rounds.

spells.name: Cloak of Shadows
spells.description: Description: You coat yourself in magical shadows, potentially removing negative spell effects. Increases stealth slightly.
spells.effect:
Effect: Has a 50% chance to remove one negative spell effect (stagger, chill, burn, etc.). Increases Stealth by 2 + 2/additional rank.
You can only use this ability 2 times per day.

spells.name: Shadow Tentacles
spells.description: Description: Summon a patch of dark, grabbing tentacles that root your foes in place and deals increasing shadow damage until they can escape.
spells.effect:
Effect: Roots all hostile targets in a 10 foot + 5/additional rank radius. Targets caught in the Shadow Tentacle spell must make a Strength save (DC: 12 + 2/additional rank) or be rooted. Rooted targets suffer increasing damage the more rounds they remain rooted:
Round 1 - 1d4 + 1d4/additional rank
Round 2 - 1d6 + 1d6/additional rank
Rounds 3+ - 1d8 + 1d8/additional rank
Escaping the tentacles resets the damage if you are re-rooted. The tentacles may also be attacked to reduce the strength of their grasp.
*Rooted targets have a move speed of zero but may still use their upper bodies to take actions.
This attack cannot be phased.

spells.name: Shadow Explosion
spells.description: Description: You expel a shadowy explosion outward striking all targets within 20 feet.
spells.effect:
Effect: All creatures affected by the spell must make a Reflex save (DC: 14), targets that succeed save for half damage, those that fail take full damage.
This attack cannot be phased.

spells.cost: Cost: Reduce Max MP by 10% + 2% Max MP/additional rank
spells.effect:
Effect: Target must make a Control save (DC: 12 + 2/additional rank); if the target succeeds they are immune to your dominate attempts for 24 hours and if they fail they become dominated for 1d4 rounds. Target makes a Control save immediately and at the start of each of their turns.
The caster who is dominating someone may take 1 action on the dominated target's turn if the dominated targets fail to break the dominate effect.

spells.name: Shadow Infusion
spells.description: Description: Empower your shadow spells to reinvigorate yourself.

This ability has a 2 round cooldown after expiring.

spells.description: Description: Consume a Shadow Word: Pain effect on a target to deal a sudden burst of damage.
spells.effect:
Effect: Deal one more round of Shadow Word: Pain damage to the target and reduce Shadow Word: Pain's duration to 0.

Drains 1d8 x 20 SP
Drains 1d6 x 2 CP
Drains 1d6 x 2 DP
